formula: G.f.: x/U(0)/(1-x) where U(k) = 1 - x + x^2*(k+1)*(k+2)/U(k+1); (continued fraction, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 14 2012G.f.: x/(1-x)/Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 + x - x*(k+2)/(1+x*(k+1)/Q(k+1)); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Apr 21 2013If n is even, a(n) ~ (-1)^(1+n/2) * n! * 2^(n+2)/Pi^(n+1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 23 2013
maple: G(x):=exp(x)*tanh(x): f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 54 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n],n=0..27 );# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 05 2009]
prog: (PARI) x='x+O('x^66); concat([0], Vec(serlaplace( tanh(x)*exp(x) ) ) ) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 21 2013
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs Mar 15 1997 by _Olivier GÃ©rard_.
Definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 18 2012
